name: Horde Grunt
prompt: An orc footman in rugged leather and plate, holding a heavy wooden shield and crude axe, standing guard at the gates of Orgrimmar. Red Horde banners flap in a dry, dusty wind under a blazing Durotar sun. Cinematic, game art, dynamic lighting.

name: Stormwind Defender
prompt: A human guard in gleaming blue-and-gold plate with a lion-crested kite shield blocks a narrow stone bridge into Stormwind. Flags, stone towers, and a bright morning sky create a heroic, high-fantasy feel.

name: Ironforge Guardian
prompt: A stout dwarf in thick, rune-etched plate armor stands before a grand stone gate carved into a snowy mountain. He hefts a heavy tower shield, glowing runes faintly pulsing. Snow drifts, warm forge light behind.

name: Silvermoon Shadowblade
prompt: A blood elf rogue in crimson-and-gold leather perches on a balustrade in Silvermoon at night, twin daggers shimmering with faint arcane energy. Lanterns cast long shadows across elven architecture.

name: Gurubashi Stalker
prompt: A jungle troll rogue with tusks and warpaint crouches atop a vine-wrapped ruin in Stranglethorn Vale. Moonlight filters through dense canopy, twin blades catching the light.

name: Kirin Tor Apprentice
prompt: A young human mage in violet robes studies a floating, glowing sigil in the streets of Dalaran. Arcane runes orbit a crystal, with the spires of the floating city behind.

name: Dalaran Evoker
prompt: A high elf caster in flowing violet-and-silver robes channels a ribbon of blue arcane energy between her hands, with floating books and levitating lanterns in a Dalaran library.

name: Duskwood Wolf
text: End of your turn: Give a random ally +1 ATK.
prompt: A grey wolf with glowing yellow eyes prowls along a misty path in Duskwood. Lanterns flicker among twisted oaks; a full moon looms through low clouds.

name: Barrens Kodo
prompt: A massive kodo with weathered hide and ceremonial totems attached to its harness trudges across the orange savanna of the Barrens. Heat haze shimmers; vultures circle above.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
prompt: A powerful striped tiger stalks through dense jungle foliage in Stranglethorn Vale, muscles taut, eyes focused. Sunbeams slice through the canopy, dust motes sparkling.

name: Murloc Tidehunter
prompt: Two colorful murlocs splash up from a rocky shoreline, tridents raised, with crashing waves and a stormy sky behind. Cartoonishly feral, vibrant colors, game card art.

name: Murloc Raider
prompt: A small green murloc shrieks and charges across a sandy beach with a crude spear, surf spraying behind under a dramatic dawn.

name: Voidwalker
prompt: A hulking void demon of swirling blue-purple smoke with glowing eyes and jagged claws stands protectively in front of a fel portal, fel sparks drifting in the air.

name: Felguard Enforcer
prompt: A muscular, horned demon in spiked armor wields a massive fel glaive. Green fel fire burns in his eyes; jagged obsidian ruins smolder behind.

name: Imp Overseer
prompt: A sneering fel warlock in tattered robes commands a cowering imp with a crackling green whip. A fel volcano glows in the night distance.

name: Forsaken Apothecary
text: End of your turn: Restore 2 HP to a random friendly character.
prompt: An undead apothecary in dark leather mixes glowing green vials in a shadowy laboratory under Undercity, candles flickering, fumes curling in eerie patterns.

name: Deathguard Elite
prompt: A towering undead soldier in black plate and spiked pauldrons blocks a ruined stone passage in Tirisfal Glades. Sickly green torches burn along the walls.

name: Red Dragon Whelp
prompt: A small red dragon whelp breathes a tiny jet of flame in a rocky cavern lined with glittering crystals and ancient dragon runes.

name: Goblin Sapper
text: Battlecry — Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero or a minion without Taunt.
prompt: A grinning goblin in goggles clutches a sputtering bundle of explosives while a clanky mech-pack hisses steam. A fortress wall looms in the background.

name: Gnomeregan Gearbot
prompt: A squat, brass-and-copper robot with glowing lenses and clawed hands trundles through a tunnel in Gnomeregan, sparks and steam venting as it goes.

name: Wrath Totem
text: End of your turn: Give a random ally +1 ATK.
prompt: A carved totem crackling with blue lightning stands on a windswept mesa in Thousand Needles, storm clouds swirling above.

name: Sentinel Huntress
text: Battlecry — Summon a 1/1 Owl Companion with Rush.
prompt: A night elf archer in emerald leathers calls an owl spirit from glowing lunar magic in the forests of Ashenvale. Ancient trees and wisps illuminate the scene.

name: Tauren Brave
text: Taunt. Enrage — Whenever this survives damage, gain +2 ATK.
prompt: A broad-shouldered tauren with braided horns braces a wooden totem shield, dust swirling in the red canyons of Mulgore as arrows strike the wood.

name: Silver Hand Knight
prompt: A noble paladin in gilded armor raises a shining longsword as a young squire in tabard and helm rushes to his side within a grand hall of Stormwind.

name: Earthen Ring Farseer
text: Battlecry — Restore 3 HP to a character.
prompt: An orc shaman in earthen totems channels green and blue elemental streams to mend an ally in a windswept badlands camp.

name: Exodar Peacekeeper
text: Battlecry — Restore 2 HP to a character.
prompt: A draenei priestess in azure and silver channels holy light from her crystal staff within the crystalline halls of the Exodar.

name: Kor'kron Elite
prompt: An orc rider thunders forward on a black wolf, red Kor'kron tabard snapping, axe raised high amid the roar of battle outside Orgrimmar.

name: Argent Infiltrator
prompt: A lithe rogue in white-and-gold Argent Crusade leathers slips through torchlit cathedral shadows, twin blades coated in faint holy oil.

name: Ironfur Grizzly
prompt: A heavyset brown bear with iron-like fur snarls and plants itself protectively in a pine forest clearing, snow dusting its back.

name: Stampeding Kodo
prompt: A kodo charges across the cracked red earth, dust plumes rising behind, with a caravan of orcs and trolls scattering out of the way.

name: Apprentice Conjurer
text: Battlecry — Summon a 1/1 Water Sprite with Freeze.
prompt: A young mage conjures a playful but dangerous water sprite from a floating basin, droplets suspended midair and glowing blue.

name: Succubus Tempter
prompt: A seductive demon with bat wings and a barbed whip smirks amid drifting purple smoke, fel runes glowing faintly.

name: Keeper of the Grove
text: Choose One — Deal 2 damage; or restore 2 HP.
prompt: A druid with antlers and wooden armor stands in moonlit Ashenvale, hands raised as golden leaves swirl on one side and sharp thorns on the other.

name: Bloodfen Raptor
prompt: A swift red raptor snarls atop a mossy log in a humid swamp, feathers bristling as it prepares to pounce.

name: River Crocolisk
prompt: A massive crocolisk rises from murky waters, jaws open wide, reeds and lily pads scattering around the splash.

name: Leper Gnome
prompt: A ragged, sickly gnome with glowing eyes and patched clothes brandishes a sputtering, toxic flask in a ruined alley.

name: Darkspear Berserker
text: Enrage — Whenever this survives damage, gain +2 ATK.
prompt: A lean jungle troll with bright warpaint and twin axes howls as arrows graze him, eyes blazing with fury in the humid jungle.

name: Sunreaver Bowman
prompt: A blood elf archer in crimson armor looses a glowing arrow from a marble balcony in Silvermoon, arcane banners behind.

name: Dwarven Rifleman
prompt: A stout dwarf with a long rifle takes aim from snowy ramparts, breath fogging in the cold Ironforge air.

name: Tirisfal Alchemist
text: Battlecry — Restore 2 HP to a character.
prompt: An undead apothecary stirs a bubbling green cauldron amid shelves of skulls and jars in a dank Tirisfal crypt.

name: Durotar Recruit
prompt: A young orc recruit with a crude axe stands guard along a spiked palisade in Durotar, red banners snapping in a hot desert wind at sunset.

name: Stormwind Footman
prompt: A human guard in simple blue tabard raises a round shield in a cobblestone street, candles glowing in nearby windows.

name: Warsong Commando
text: End of your turn: Give a random ally +1 ATK.
prompt: A scarred orc commander rallies grunts around a war drum, torches blazing in the Warsong encampment at dusk.

name: Scarlet Crusader
prompt: A zealot knight in red-and-white armor raises a gleaming shield, holy light flashing as arrows shatter harmlessly.

name: Argent Hearthguard
text: End of your turn: Restore 3 HP to a random friendly character.
prompt: A compassionate paladin tends to wounded soldiers beside a campfire in snowy Northrend, holy warmth warding off the cold night.

name: Sunwalker
prompt: A tauren paladin radiates golden light, runed totem mace raised, as a shimmering shield of sunrays deflects a hail of arrows.

name: Banshee Shrieker
text: Battlecry — Deal 1 damage to a character.
prompt: A ghostly banshee with flowing hair screams, a cone of ethereal force rippling through a ruined chapel lit by moonlight.

name: Ashenvale Archer
prompt: A night elf draws a moonlit bow in the boughs of an ancient tree, arrow tip glowing faintly silver.

name: Gilnean Howlrunner
prompt: A worgen in ragged coat races alongside a massive wolf through foggy, gaslamp-lit streets of Gilneas.

name: Twilight Drakeguard
prompt: A draconic warrior in dark scales and plate stands within a crystalline cave, purple twilight energy pulsing through veins of crystal.

name: Wyrmrest Warden
prompt: A red dragonkin sentinel patrols snowy parapets of Wyrmrest Temple, spear in hand, steam rising from nostrils into cold air.

name: Thunder Bluff Bravetender
text: End of your turn: Restore 1 HP to a random friendly character.
prompt: A tauren healer tends a small garden atop the mesas of Thunder Bluff as wind stirs ceremonial totems.

name: Dun Morogh Mountaineer
prompt: A dwarven mountaineer in furs braces a wide shield against a blizzard, pine trees bending under snow.

name: Sunfury Arcanist
prompt: A blood elf mage in ornate crimson robes conjures a helix of fire and arcane motes within a golden hall of Silvermoon.

name: Zandalari Spearbreaker
text: Battlecry — Deal 2 damage to a minion.
prompt: A regal troll warrior hurls a barbed spear wreathed in storm magic from atop a pyramid in Zuldazar.

name: Kul Tiran Sailor
prompt: A stocky sailor in oilskins hauls a rope on a rain-lashed deck, Boralus harbor and tall ships behind.

name: Darkspear Shadowhunter
prompt: A troll shadow hunter casts a hexed spear wreathed in emerald spirits across a jungle clearing.

name: Goldshire Pikeman
prompt: A farmer-turned-soldier holds a long pike along a country road with Goldshire cottages and fields in the background.

name: Gnomish Chemist
text: Whenever a friendly character is healed, draw a card (once per turn).
prompt: A cheerful gnome in thick goggles takes notes as a glowing blue tonic heals a wounded ally on a workbench in Gnomeregan.

name: Teldrassil Sentinel
prompt: An armored sentinel guards a moonlit bough-bridge on the great world tree, glowing lanterns swaying in the night breeze.
